attributes.action: Remove restrictions for weddings at both halls and places of worship.
attributes.additional_details:
Weddings are a once in a lifetime event and not being able to celebrate with loved ones has a big impact on one's mental health.

As long as effective testing is carried why can weddings not go ahead as normal?
attributes.background: I would like restrictions to be lifted for Weddings providing each individual has reported a negative Covid result as this is done at football matches and also the Royal Ascot.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588937
